I don't think there is a subtitle file with this download. You will have to go to subscene.com or somewhere like that and search for Hanna Montana the movie. I looked on subscene and it seems that nobody has written one for this FXG version of the movie. Maybe you can use a different one but I don't know.

Once you have a sub file, you can get it to wrok in VLC media player (which is a free download that you can google) by going to the Video menu and then selecting subtitles and then load file or something like that.

Or you can try changing the subtitle filename to exactly the same as the movie filename (only with .srt on the end instead of the normal .avi that movie files have)

ask again if you are stuck
